system.description:
Effect: When declaring this Attack, the user may freely move up to half of the Movement Score of their choice. The user ignores any [Defensive], [Shield], and [Max] effects and ignores any [Stage Change] effects the target has for this attack’s use.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Urshifu (Single Strike Style) and has a Dark-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: G-Max One Blow
